argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = A -> ( ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ <-> A e. ZZ ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_bicomd | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = A -> ( A e. ZZ <-> ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( abs ` A ) = A -> ( A e. ZZ <-> ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_znegclb | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A e. ZZ <-> -u A e. ZZ ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A e. ZZ <-> -u A e. ZZ ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = -u A -> ( ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ <-> -u A e. ZZ ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_bibi2d | |- ( ( abs ` A ) = -u A -> ( ( A e. ZZ <-> ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ ) <-> ( A e. ZZ <-> -u A e. ZZ ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( abs ` A ) = -u A -> ( A e. ZZ <-> ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_absor | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( abs ` A ) = A \/ ( abs ` A ) = -u A ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 9, 10 | #P_mpjaod | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A e. ZZ <-> ( abs ` A ) e. ZZ ) ) |
